companyDescription: Big Viking Games is a mobile and social gaming studio known for free-to-play titles on Facebook and mobile platforms.
description: Contributed to the development of "Tiny Kingdoms" (JavaScript) and "GalatronVS" (Unity)
Developed internal tools, including animation and sound editors as well as Unity plugins
Collaborated with designers and artists to implement user-friendly UI/UX
achievements: Created internal tools to enhance team productivity
